snippet: SHAW--Martin M. Died at home on April 13, age 86, of myelofibrosis. Survived by his adored wife of 57 years, Joan; his son, Daniel; his daughter and son-in-law, Nancy and James Chochrek; his grandchildren Ella, Ian, Anna. Services 1pm Friday at Ballard-Durand, White Plains, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHAW--Martin M. Died at home on April 13, age 86, of myelofibrosis. Survived by his adored wife of 57 years, Joan; his son, Daniel; his daughter and son-in-law, Nancy and James Chochrek; his grandchildren Ella, Ian, Anna. Services 1pm Friday at Ballard-Durand, White Plains, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHAW, MARTIN M
